message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 70, you get 30. What do you say?
I'll match your fairness, but I think I deserve a bit more. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to match fairness, but I think I deserve a bit more. I'll make a new offer: 55 for me, 45 for you.
I'm still willing to compromise. I'll take 45, you get 55. What do you say?
I'll try to get a bit more, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. What do you say?
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with a 20% difference. I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of the deal. I'll offer: 42 for me, 58 for you.
I'm getting a bit desperate. I'll take 36, you get 64. It's the best I can do. What do you say?
